ncc-examplecorp001-007 unencrypted communication channel in camera web services 
 medium attackers on the user's local network can intercept and modify traffic, capturing user credentials, tokens, and data or modifying traffic flowing between the mobile and web applications and the camera. the exploitability of this vulnerability is medium, as an attacker with access to the user's local network could easily intercept and monitor or modify the application's communication. ncc-examplecorp001-007

ncc-examplecorp001-008 horizontal authorization bypass in storage api 
 medium high medium ncc-examplecorp001-008

ncc-examplecorp001-010 application uses weak hash to store passwords 
 medium an attacker who is able to compromise the application's storage, such as through a database flaw or information disclosure, can more easily recover user passwords. medium ncc-examplecorp001-010

 medium medium medium ncc-examplecorp001-013
